text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Rebecca Jones, coronavirus data chief in Florida, was fired for refusing to manipulate case data to justify reopen. She was asked to censor information and skew case totals. ￼￼￼SHE SAID NO!
Officials wanted her to change numbers to be in line with Trump, but she refused.
